entry.title: Bitcoin Core 0.10.0rc4 tagged
entry.summary: On February 5th, 2015, Wladimir announced the tagging of v0.10rc4 and pushed his signatures to the gitian.sigs repository. He requested for the Gitian builders to be started. The response was quick, with 9 gitian builders already in operation. As a result, the executables and tarball for rc4 have been uploaded to the usual place at https://bitcoin.org/bin/0.10.0/test/.
